dmca.title: Printer peeved at appropriation of advertising prose
dmca.body:
Sirs;

I require your immediate help concerning another website that has stolen our page copy and despite written and repeated verbal warnings to one [private], owner, as well as our supplying him with a copy writer to make the changes, they have refused to remove our copy. Our URL is: http://www.losangelesprintingcompany. The URL that has illegally used our copy is: http://www.cereusgraphics.com.

They have stolen copy from several of our pages including my home page, http://www.losangelesprintingcompany.com/default.htm. I am attaching a comparison herein for your convenience.

I have a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright or intellectual property owner, my self, its agent, or the law.

I swear under penalty of perjury, consistent with U.S. Code Title 17, 512, that the above information in this Notice is accurate and that I am the copyright or intellectual property owner of the copy on my website.

Please kindly look into this at once and I ask that you delete their offending pages from your database. Thank you


[private]
webmaster@losangelesprintinacompany.com
[private]
[private]
Los Angeles, CA 90045
6 pages
Comparison of copy between sites
OUR ORIGINAL COPY: http://www.losangelesprintinacompany.com/default.htm Full Color Printing Specialists
